text: Electric Dreams is a 1984 British American science fiction romantic comedy movie directed by first time director Steve Barron and starring Lenny Von Dohlen, Virginia Madsen, Maxwell Caulfield, Bud Cort, Don Fellows, Giorgio Moroder. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:1984 science fiction movies Category:British science fiction movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Steve Barron Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies about artificial intelligence Category:Movies about computing Category:Movies about technological impact
title: Electric Dreams (movie)
